title: Total synthesis of [β-HIle]2-nodupetide: effect of ester to amide substitution on its antimicrobial activity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21778-21785
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04401K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Harra Ismi Farah, Unang Supratman, Ace Tatang Hidayat, Rani Maharani
[β-HIle]2-nodupetide is a nodupetide analogue, in which HMHA residue of nodupetide is replaced with β-HIle and it changes the ester to amide bond in the nodupetide's backbone.
